title: 5 looks we love this week: Meghan Markle, Emilia Clarke, Jason Momoa and more
text:
5 looks we love this week: Meghan Markle, Emilia Clarke, Jason Momoa and more originally appeared on goodmorningamerica.com

Hello Friday, nice to see you again.

This week so many celebrities stepped out and stunned many of us with unforgettable top-notch style.

(MORE: Fashion influencer Julia Engel shares her tips for finding stylish winter coats)

From Duchess Meghan's pretty purple dress for the One Young World Summit Opening Ceremony to Jason Momoa's shiny pink suit spotted at the world premiere of Apple TV+'s "See," there were so many great moments.

Just ahead, see five standout looks we couldn't get enough of.

Tessa Thompson

PHOTO: Tessa Thompson attends as Cinema Society hosts a special screening of Disney+'s 'Lady And The Tramp' at iPic Theater on Oct. 22, 2019, in New York. (Dimitrios Kambouris/Getty Images) More

Thompson channeled '70s style in a chic suit from Loewe that included flared trousers for a special screening of Disney+'s "Lady And The Tramp" in New York City.

Meghan Markle

PHOTO: Meghan, Duchess of Sussex attends the One Young World Summit Opening Ceremony at Royal Albert Hall on Oct. 22, 2019, in London. (Karwai Tang/WireImage/Getty Images) More

The Duchess of Sussex brought smiles to a lot of faces as she glided through London's One Young World Summit Opening Ceremony in a long-sleeved purple dress from Aritzia.

Garcelle Beauvais

PHOTO: Garcelle Beauvais attends The Los Angeles Mission Legacy Of Vision Gala at The Beverly Hilton Hotel on Oct. 24, 2019, in Beverly Hills, Calif. (Leon Bennett/WireImage/Getty Images) More

For The Los Angeles Mission Legacy Of Vision Gala the actress and host looked great in a cropped lace blouse topped over trousers and sparkly pumps.

(MORE: Body-positive influencers break down how to shop plus-size Halloween costumes)

Emilia Clarke

PHOTO: Emilia Clarke seen returning to her hotel whilst promoting new movie 'Last Christmas' on Oct. 24, 2019, in London. (Neil Mockford/GC Images/Getty Images) More

Clarke was spotted in an amazing burnt orange suit while out and about in London.

Jason Momoa

PHOTO: Jason Momoa attends the world premiere of Apple TV+'s 'See' at Fox Village Theater on Oct. 21, 2019, in Los Angeles. (Rodin Eckenroth/FilmMagic/Getty Images) More

Momoa shined in a pink suit this week for Apple TV+'s "See" at Fox Village Theater in Los Angeles.
